text: 'in faealtum -ayha almwmnwn- ma 'amarakum allah bih ystr ealaykum dhnwbkm, wayudkhilakum janaat tajri min taht ashjarha alanhar, wamasakin tahrt zakiatan fi janaat 'iiqamat dayimat la tnqte, dhlk hu alfawz aldhy la fawz baedah. wanaemat 'ukhraa lkm- 'ayuha almwmnwn- tuhibuwnaha hi nasr min allah yatykm, wafath eajil yatimu ealaa aydykm. wbshshir almuminin -ayha alnby- bialnasr walfath fi aldnya, waljnt fi alakhrt
